dialogue.speaker: Zed
dialogue.line: I didnâ€™t expect that we will discover an island far in the mainland.

dialogue.speaker: Deemo
dialogue.line: But even though it is very far, human garbage finds its way in.

dialogue.speaker: Zed
dialogue.line: Yes, you are right. Garbage is a problem in any part of the world.

dialogue.speaker: Deemo
dialogue.line: Hey Zed! There seems to be a person there. It seems we are not alone on this island.
